name: Flappy Bee!
description:
• A re-imagining of the 2013 classic
  • Progressively gets more difficult
  • Collectible flowers! Get four for a special power-up
  • The background changes as you get more points!
    • Bee may accessorize accordingly

This is my first "complete" game that took about a month to develop! Hope you enjoy!

========================================

BGM: "Miracle Park”, from PlayOnLoop.com
